definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: Don't play with scissors or pen knives.
She noticed that the box cutter had disappeared from the room.
sentences.chinese: 女人同时注意到，之前房间里的美工刀已经消失了。

sentences.english: We take away guns and bombs, the terrorists use box cutters.
sentences.chinese: 我们查获枪支和炸弹，恐怖分子使用美工刀。

sentences.english: Don't wear sandals when working with an X-Acto knife.
sentences.chinese: 使用美工刀切割时，千万不要穿拖鞋。

sentences.english: A folding cutter is provided, which belongs to the cutter technology filed.
sentences.chinese: 折叠美工刀，属于刀具技术领域。

sentences.english: Use caution when cutting with the utility knife.
sentences.chinese: 使用时要多加小心切割与美工刀。

sentences.english: They fuck up all the tables with their cutters.
sentences.chinese: 桌子总会被他们的美工刀搞砸。

sentences.english: No gun today, and all I had in my cart was a shovel and a box cutter.
sentences.chinese: 但今天我没带枪，而我的球车里只有铁铲和美工刀。

sentences.english: I bet they find Box cutters all over the place.
sentences.chinese: 我猜他们在那儿一定发现了好多美工刀。
